description: Hub keeps disconnecting from WiFi network
solution: Ensure router is compatible with 5GHz networks. Update firmware to version 2.4.0 or higher.

description: Cannot complete initial setup of the Hub
solution: Reset the device by holding the reset button for 10 seconds. Ensure you're using the latest app version.
Check if color changing is enabled in the app settings. If problem persists, factory reset the bulb by turning it on and off 5 times.
Place the SmartHaven Hub closer to the bulb. Check for interference from other wireless devices.

description: Temperature readings from SmartSense seem inaccurate
solution: Calibrate the sensor in the app settings. Ensure it's not placed near heat sources or in direct sunlight.

description: SmartLock Plus battery drains too quickly
solution: Update to firmware version 3.1.2 which includes power optimization. Consider using lithium batteries for longer life.
Clean the infrared sensors. Enable enhanced night mode in advanced settings.

description: SmartPlug Mini doesn't work with high-power appliances
solution: The SmartPlug Mini is rated for devices up to 1200W. For higher power devices, use the SmartPlug Pro model.
Place the thermostat away from drafts, sunlight, and heat sources. Run the calibration wizard in the app.
Ensure screen is clean. Update firmware to version 1.2.0 which includes touch sensitivity improvements.
